attributes.action: Give NHS frontline staff a share of the £350 Million a week saving from Brexit.
attributes.additional_details: Give to those earning less than the national average salary. A chance to level up Britain.
attributes.background: Remember the big Red Bus with ‘Let’s give our NHS the £350 million the EU takes every week’.  That would cover £50 a week easily. It’s enough for all employees of NHS to get £290 a week at least.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

The Government has already introduced legislation which would increase funding for the NHS by £33.9 billion a year (in cash terms) by 2023/24. You can find out more here:
https://www.gov.uk/government/news/nhs-funding-bill-enters-parliament.

We're not sure whether you want to see an additional £350 million per week allocated specifically to fund a pay rise for NHS staff, or whether you'd like this to come from the additional funding the Government has already announced.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign the following petitions:

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Give all Nurses and lower paid NHS Staff a tax free bonus of £5000
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568198
